questions.question: What is the primary purpose of an IAM Role in AWS?
options: To grant permissions to AWS services

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a configuration option for EC2 instances?
What is the main function of a Security Group in AWS?
options: To control inbound and outbound traffic for EC2 instances
To store data on virtual drives

questions.question: Which EC2 instance type is optimized for memory-intensive applications?
What is the primary advantage of using Spot Instances in AWS?
options: Low cost with up to 90% discount

questions.question: Which AWS service is used to create thumbnails from images stored in S3?
What is the main purpose of an Application Load Balancer (ALB) in AWS?
options: To distribute incoming traffic across multiple targets

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon Aurora?
options: High availability with 6 copies of data across 3 AZs

questions.question: What is the primary use case for Amazon ElastiCache?
Which of the following is NOT a type of Elastic Load Balancer (ELB) in AWS?
What is the primary benefit of using AWS Lambda?
Which of the following is a feature of RDS Read Replicas?
options: Only one read replica per instance

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of an Auto Scaling Group (ASG) in AWS?
options: To automatically adjust the number of EC2 instances based on demand

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon EFS?
options: Can be attached to multiple EC2 instances

questions.question: What is the primary use case for AWS Fargate?
Which of the following is a feature of Amazon RDS?
What is the primary purpose of AWS CloudWatch?
options: To monitor AWS resources and applications

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon S3?
What is the primary purpose of AWS Elastic Beanstalk?
options: To deploy and manage applications easily

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon DynamoDB?
What is the primary purpose of an EC2 Instance Store?
Which of the following is a feature of AWS Lambda's asynchronous invocation?
options: Retries on errors up to 3 times

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of using AWS Savings Plans?
options: Commitment to a specific amount of compute power for discounted rates

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon Aurora Serverless?
options: Pay per second with automated scaling

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of AWS Elastic Load Balancer (ELB)?
options: To distribute incoming traffic across multiple targets

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon ElastiCache?
What is the primary purpose of AWS CloudFormation?
options: To automate the deployment of AWS infrastructure

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon RDS Multi-AZ?
What is the primary purpose of AWS Step Functions?
options: To coordinate multiple AWS services into serverless workflows

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon S3 Glacier?
options: High-performance storage for frequently accessed data
Low-cost storage for long-term data archiving

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of AWS Config?
options: To track and manage AWS resource configurations

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon CloudFront?
options: Content delivery network (CDN) for fast content delivery

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of AWS Systems Manager?
options: To manage and automate operational tasks across AWS resources

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon Redshift?
What is the primary purpose of AWS Elastic Beanstalk?
options: To deploy and manage applications easily

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon DynamoDB?
What is the primary purpose of AWS Lambda's synchronous invocation?
options: Retries on errors up to 3 times

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon RDS Automated Backups?
options: Daily full backups and transaction logs every 5 minutes

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of AWS CloudTrail?
options: To track user activity and API usage across AWS infrastructure

questions.question: Which of the following is a feature of Amazon EFS Infrequent Access (EFS-IA)?
options: High cost compared to EFS Standard
Automatically moves files not accessed for 60 days to lower-cost storage
